sentences.sContent: They even bestride the carriage lamps.
sentences.sCn: 他们甚至骑在马车的灯笼上。

sentences.sContent: The man from the Pru will bestride the continent like a colossal salesman, hoping to convert the aspirations and fears of these new middle classes into sterling.
sentences.sContent_eng: The man from the Pru will bestride the continent like a colossal salesman, hoping to convert the aspirations and fears of these new middle classes into sterling.
sentences.sCn: 信诚公司象个优秀的推销员，横跨欧洲大陆，希望把这些新的中产阶层的志向和机遇变成英镑。
